entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SSE 20 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Fernie. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow except snow at times heavy near Fernie. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow over southwestern sections early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
